meta.name: When Death Comes Knocking
meta.description: In When Death Comes Knocking, each episode follows a homicide investigation where crucial evidence was caught on a Ring-style doorbell or home security footage.

videos.title: Ninja Sword Murder
videos.overview: When 16-year-old Ronan Kanda is killed with a ninja sword in Wolverhampton, CCTV and doorbell cameras uncover a chilling tale of teenage revenge and mistaken identity..
